warnings.name: unused_local_variable
warnings.message: the variable '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_local_constant
warnings.message: the constant '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_global_variable
warnings.message: the global variable '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_global_constant
warnings.message: the global constant '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_internal_class
warnings.message: the class '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_internal_struct
warnings.message: the struct '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_internal_concept
warnings.message: the concept '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_internal_interface
warnings.message: the interface '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_internal_function
warnings.message: the function '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_private_field
warnings.message: the field '{}' in '{}' '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_private_method
warnings.message: the method '{}' in '{}' '{}' is declared but never used.

warnings.name: unused_private_property
warnings.message: the property '{}' in '{}' '{}' is declared but never used.

errors.name: expected_toplevel_decl
errors.message: expected a type, function, or variable declaration.

errors.name: constant_requires_type_annotation
errors.message: constant declaration '{}' requires either a type-annotation or intializer.

errors.name: variable_requires_type_annotation
errors.message: variable declaration '{}' requires either a type-annotation or intializer.

errors.name: local_constant_name_previously_defined
errors.message: local constant named '{}' is already defined in this scope.

errors.name: local_variable_name_previously_defined
errors.message: local variable named '{}' is already defined in this scope.

errors.name: definition_already_exists
errors.message: the current context already contains a definition for '{}'.

errors.name: multiple_member_definitions
errors.message: the type '{}' already contains a definition for '{}'.

errors.name: undeclared_identifier
errors.message: the name '{}' does not exist in the current context.

errors.name: irreducible_type
errors.message: the types '{}' and '{}' do not share a common type.

errors.name: mismatched_type_assignment
errors.message: the type '{}' cannot be assigned to an instance of '{}'.

errors.name: infinitely_recursive_return_type_deduction
errors.message: deducing return type is infinitely recursive.
